bibl.title: Monks and the End of Greco-Roman Paganism in Syria and Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: During fifteen years, 385-400, the monks, especially in Syria and Alexandria, played a decisive part in destroying paganism.
bibl.seg: FREND William H.C., Monks and the End of Greco-Roman Paganism in Syria and Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
During fifteen years, 385-400, the monks, especially in Syria and Alexandria, played a decisive part in destroying paganism.
